author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS TO THE SOUTH OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS TO THE SOUTH OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Mon Sep 01 the center of Twelve-E was located near 17.2, -105.4 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS TO THE SOUTH OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 9:00 PM CST Mon Sep 01 the center of Twelve-E was located near 17.2, -105.4 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Twelve-E (EP2/EP122025)
